headline: Fortinet, Inc. (FTNT) Extends Armis Partnership; UBS Stays Neutral
summary: Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is among the most profitable software stocks to invest in. On Friday, October 10, 2025, Roger Boyd, an analyst at UBS, reiterated a Hold rating on Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT). Earlier, on October 7, 2025, the company announced its extended partnership with Armis, a California-based company specializing in cyber exposure management & security, […]
